verses.verse: It <S%H4428>happened,<s%> when king <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H7167>it,<s%> that he tore his <S%H899>clothes,<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> himself with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> and <S%H935>went<s%> into <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

He <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H471>Eliakim,<s%> who was over the <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H7644>Shebna<s%> the <S%H5608>scribe,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H3680>covered<s%> with <S%H8242>sackcloth,<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz.<s%>

They <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> "Thus says <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H3117><s%> 'This day is a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble,<s%> and of <S%H8433>rebuke,<s%> and of <S%H5007>rejection;<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> have <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4866>birth,<s%> and there is no <S%H3581>strength<s%> to bring <S%H3205>forth.<s%>

It may be <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H7262>Rabshakeh,<s%> whom the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and will <S%H3198>rebuke<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H8085>heard.<s%> Therefore lift <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H8605>prayer<s%> for the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> that is <S%H4672>left.<s%>'"
So the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3470>Isaiah.<s%>

<S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> "Tell your <S%H113>master,<s%> <S%H559><s%> 'Thus says <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H3372>"Don't<s%> be afraid <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that you have <S%H8085>heard,<s%> with which the <S%H5288>servants<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> have blasphemed <S%H1442>me.<s%>

<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I will put a <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in him and he will <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8052>news,<s%> and will <S%H7725>return<s%> to his own <S%H776>land.<s%> I will cause him to <S%H5307>fall<s%> by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> in his own <S%H776>land.<s%>"'"

So <S%H7262>Rabshakeh<s%> <S%H7725>returned,<s%> and <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H3898>warring<s%> against <S%H3841>Libnah,<s%> for he had <S%H8085>heard<s%> that he was <S%H5265>departed<s%> from <S%H3923>Lachish.<s%>

He <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H559>news<s%> concerning <S%H8640>Tirhakah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3568>Ethiopia,<s%> "He has come <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H8085>you.<s%>" When he heard <S%H7971>it,<s%> he sent <S%H4397>messengers<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"Thus you shall <S%H559>speak<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H430><s%> 'Don't let your God in whom you <S%H982>trust<s%> <S%H5377>deceive<s%> <S%H559>you,<s%> saying, <S%H3389>"Jerusalem<s%> <S%H5414>won't<s%> be given into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria.<s%>"

<S%H8085>Behold,<s%> you have heard what the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> have <S%H6213>done<s%> to all <S%H776>lands,<s%> by destroying them <S%H2763>utterly.<s%> Shall you be <S%H5337>delivered?<s%>

Have the <S%H430>gods<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5337>delivered<s%> <S%H1>them,<s%> which my fathers have <S%H7843>destroyed,<s%> <S%H1470>Gozan,<s%> <S%H2771>Haran,<s%> <S%H7530>Rezeph,<s%> and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5729>Eden<s%> who were in <S%H8515>Telassar?<s%>

Where is the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H2574>Hamath,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H774>Arpad,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H5617>Sepharvaim,<s%> of <S%H2012>Hena,<s%> and <S%H5755>Ivvah?<s%>'"

<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H3947>received<s%> the <S%H5612>letter<s%> from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H4397>messengers<s%> and <S%H7121>read<s%> <S%H2396>it.<s%> Then Hezekiah went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> it <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H2396>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3068>"Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who is <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> among the <S%H3742>cherubim,<s%> you are the <S%H430>God,<s%> even you <S%H4467>alone,<s%> of all the kingdoms of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> You have <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth.<s%>

<S%H5186>Turn<s%> your <S%H241>ear,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear.<s%> <S%H6491>Open<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold.<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> all of the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5576>Sennacherib,<s%> who has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H2778>defy<s%> the <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>
<S%H551>Truly,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> have <S%H2717>destroyed<s%> all the <S%H776>countries<s%> and their <S%H776>land,<s%>

and have <S%H5414>cast<s%> their <S%H430>gods<s%> into the <S%H784>fire;<s%> for they were no <S%H430>gods,<s%> but the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>'s <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H6086>wood<s%> and <S%H68>stone;<s%> therefore they have destroyed <S%H6>them.<s%>

Now <S%H3068>therefore,<s%> Yahweh our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3467>save<s%> us from his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> that all the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> may <S%H3045>know<s%> that you are <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> even you only."

Then <S%H3470>Isaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H531>Amoz<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H2396>Hezekiah,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6419><s%> 'Because you have prayed to me against <S%H5576>Sennacherib<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%>

this is the <S%H1697>word<s%> which <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning <S%H1330>him.<s%> The virgin <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%> has <S%H959>despised<s%> you and <S%H3932>ridiculed<s%> <S%H1323>you.<s%> The daughter of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> has <S%H5128>shaken<s%> her <S%H7218>head<s%> at <S%H310>you.<s%>

Whom have you <S%H2778>defied<s%> and <S%H1442>blasphemed?<s%> Against whom have you <S%H7311>exalted<s%> your <S%H6963>voice<s%> and lifted <S%H5375>up<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> on <S%H4791>high?<s%> Against the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3027>By<s%> your <S%H5650>servants,<s%> have you <S%H2778>defied<s%> the <S%H136>Lord,<s%> and have <S%H559>said,<s%> "With the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of my <S%H7393>chariots<s%> I have come <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H4791>height<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> to the innermost <S%H3411>parts<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon.<s%> I will cut <S%H3772>down<s%> its <S%H6967>tall<s%> <S%H730>cedars<s%> and its <S%H4005>choice<s%> fir <S%H1265>trees.<s%> I will <S%H935>enter<s%> into its <S%H7093>farthest<s%> <S%H4791>height,<s%> the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of its fruitful <S%H3760>field.<s%>

I have <S%H6979>dug<s%> and <S%H8354>drunk<s%> <S%H4325>water,<s%> and with the <S%H3709>sole<s%> of my <S%H6471>feet<s%> I will dry <S%H2717>up<s%> all the <S%H2975>rivers<s%> of <S%H4693>Egypt.<s%>"

Have you not <S%H8085>heard<s%> how I have <S%H6213>done<s%> it long <S%H7350>ago,<s%> and <S%H3335>formed<s%> it in <S%H6924>ancient<s%> <S%H3117>times?<s%> Now I have <S%H935>brought<s%> it to <S%H7582>pass,<s%> that it should be yours to destroy <S%H1219>fortified<s%> <S%H5892>cities,<s%> turning them into <S%H5327>ruinous<s%> <S%H1530>heaps.<s%>

Therefore their <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> had <S%H7116>little<s%> <S%H3027>power.<s%> They were <S%H2865>dismayed<s%> and <S%H954>confounded.<s%> They were like the <S%H6212>grass<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> and like the <S%H3419>green<s%> <S%H1877>herb,<s%> like the <S%H2682>grass<s%> on the <S%H1406>housetops,<s%> and like a field <S%H6440>before<s%> its <S%H7709>crop<s%> has <S%H7054>grown.<s%>
But I <S%H3045>know<s%> your <S%H3427>sitting<s%> <S%H3318>down,<s%> your going out, your coming <S%H935>in,<s%> and your raging against <S%H7264>me.<s%>

Because of your <S%H7264>raging<s%> against <S%H7600>me,<s%> and because your arrogance has come <S%H5927>up<s%> into my <S%H241>ears,<s%> therefore will I <S%H7760>put<s%> my <S%H2397>hook<s%> in your <S%H639>nose<s%> and my <S%H4964>bridle<s%> in your <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and I will turn you <S%H7725>back<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%> by which you <S%H935>came.<s%>

This shall be the <S%H226>sign<s%> to <S%H398>you.<s%> You will eat this <S%H8141>year<s%> that which <S%H5599>grows<s%> of <S%H8145>itself,<s%> and in the second <S%H8141>year<s%> that which <S%H7823>springs<s%> from the <S%H7992>same;<s%> and in the third <S%H8141>year<s%> <S%H2232>sow<s%> and <S%H7114>reap<s%> and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> their <S%H6529>fruit.<s%>

The <S%H7604>remnant<s%> that is <S%H6413>escaped<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> will <S%H3254>again<s%> take <S%H8328>root<s%> <S%H4295>downward,<s%> and <S%H6213>bear<s%> <S%H6529>fruit<s%> <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

For out of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H7611>remnant<s%> will go <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and survivors will <S%H6413>escape<s%> from <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H6726>Zion.<s%> The <S%H7068>zeal<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> will perform <S%H6213>this.<s%>'

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> concerning the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria,<s%> <S%H935><s%> 'He will not come to this <S%H5892>city,<s%> nor <S%H3384>shoot<s%> an <S%H2671>arrow<s%> <S%H6923>there,<s%> neither will he come before it with <S%H4043>shield,<s%> nor <S%H8210>cast<s%> up a mound against <S%H5550>it.<s%>
By the <S%H1870>way<s%> that he <S%H935>came,<s%> by the same he shall <S%H7725>return,<s%> and he shall not <S%H935>come<s%> to this <S%H5892>city,<s%>' <S%H5002>says<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
<S%H1598><s%> 'For I will defend this <S%H5892>city<s%> to <S%H3467>save<s%> <S%H5650>it,<s%> for my own sake, and for my servant <S%H1732>David<s%>'s sake.'"

The <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> and <S%H5221>struck<s%> one <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8084>eighty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> men in the <S%H4264>camp<s%> of the <S%H804>Assyrians.<s%> When men arose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> <S%H4191>behold,<s%> these were all dead <S%H6297>bodies.<s%>
So <S%H5576>Sennacherib<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H804>Assyria<s%> <S%H5265>departed,<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> <S%H7725>away,<s%> returned to <S%H5210>Nineveh,<s%> and stayed <S%H3427>there.<s%>

It <S%H7812>happened,<s%> as he was worshipping in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5268>Nisroch<s%> his <S%H430>god,<s%> that <S%H152>Adrammelech<s%> and <S%H8272>Sharezer<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H5221>struck<s%> him with the <S%H2719>sword;<s%> and they <S%H4422>escaped<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H780>Ararat.<s%> Esar <S%H634>Haddon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> reigned in his <S%H4427>place.<s%>
